version_description: Bug fixes.
Bug fixes.

Mit der NEUEN MoneyGram®-App wird das weltweite Senden von Geld schneller und einfacher. Noch dazu können Sie Ihre Geldtransfers nachverfolgen, Gebühren ermitteln, Filialen finden, Ihr Profil und Ihre Einstellungen verwalten und vieles mehr.

We’ve made a number of improvements to our app to make it more reliable and efficient:
- Fixed issues that were preventing some users from completing registration.
- Fixed a crash when attempting to scan an ID during the ID upload process.

Some bug fixes and improved app performance.

"MoneyGram Plus Rewards are now available!
Added 'Cash at a Location' as a new payment method
Minor Bug Fixes"
Some bug fixes and improved app performance.

This release introduces a new payment method ‘Cash at Location’ and addresses various bugs within the app. If you want to pay for your money transfer in cash, you can now initiate the transaction in the app, then pay for it at a location. This feature wil

’Cash at Location’ is now available as a payment method in Chile. The 'Cash at Location' payment method allows you to initiate a cash transaction in the app, then pay for it at a MoneyGram location. This feature will help you save time in the store.

• The MoneyGram app is now available for download in Canada with French Canadian language support.
• If you are receiving money, you can now initiate a cash pickup through the new ‘Track + Receive’ feature in the app, and then pick up your money at a M

• Transferring money to your friends and loved ones just got easier. After successfully completing your first money transfer to any recipient, you can now easily repeat that transfer with the new ‘Send Again’ feature.
• Various bug fixes.

This release introduces the following features and enhancements:
• Customers in Canada are now able to pay for a money transfer with their bank account through the Interac service
• Customers in the UK, Germany, Spain, Belgium, Austria and Poland ar

Easier Loyalty Program Enrollment
Now, when you create an online profile, you can easily enroll in MoneyGram Plus Rewards™ at the same time. If you already have a profile and want to sign up for free, click “Enroll Now” on your profile home page.
